metadata.title: CVE-2024-35850 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: qca: fix NULL-deref on non-serdev setup Qualcomm ROMEcontrollers can be registered from the Bluetooth line discipline and inthis case the HCI UART serdev pointer is NULL. Add the missing sanity checkto prevent a NULL-pointer dereference when setup() is called for anon-serdev controller.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
